entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning.
